by_application_id.map: function(doc){if (doc.application_id) {emit(doc.application_id, {id: doc._id, rev: doc._rev, client_id: doc.client_id, user_type: doc.user_type, uname: doc.uname, pw: doc.pw, data: doc.data});}}

by_client_id.map: function(doc){if (doc.client_id) {emit(doc.client_id, {id: doc._id, rev: doc._rev, client_id: doc.client_id, user_type: doc.user_type, uname: doc.uname, pw: doc.pw, data: doc.data});}}
